EmailTemplate.name: POST FILING CR Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: CR Rejection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom regarding your Copyright application.
Please note that LegalZoom is not a law firm and cannot take any action to either impact or alter the decision of the Copyright Office regarding your application.
The Copyright Office provides basic guidelines for the kind of works that it will register, but reviews each submitted work on its own. The Copyright Office has final determination as to whether the work can be copyrighted. LegalZoom cannot anticipate what the Copyright Office will decide regarding whether a given work can be copyrighted, nor can we guarantee that a copyright application we submit on a customer's behalf will be accepted by the Copyright Office.
If you would like to request reconsideration of your application, please follow the instructions provided by the Copyright Office in their correspondence to you. Be sure to include a copy of the reply sheet when you submit your request for reconsideration.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone}. Our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
Best,
The LegalZoom Team ___________________________________
{!snippetVariable.tmoa_bap}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
